messages.msgSnippet: ~~I am an unschooling mum with two boys, 5 and 1 yo.  We live on the outer coast of Baranof Island in Southeast Alaska.  ~~ Welcome from a former Alaskan. I
messages.messageBody:
~~I am an unschooling mum with two boys, 5 and 1 yo. We live on the
outer coast of Baranof Island in Southeast Alaska. ~~

Welcome from a former Alaskan.
I left Fairbanks in 1987, so it's been a while. My two sisters are in
Wasilla and I have several family members in Fairbanks still. Glad to
have another Alaskan here....though I think you're all crazy. :)


Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: Intro - unschooler in Southeast Alaska
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I haven t posted yet, just reading others posts... I am an unschooling mum with two boys, 5 and 1 yo.  We live on the outer coast of Baranof Island in
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I haven't posted yet, just reading others' posts...

I am an unschooling mum with two boys, 5 and 1 yo. We live on the
outer coast of Baranof Island in Southeast Alaska. It is quite
wonderfully remote here and at times I feel like we are the only ones
living with our children in this way. Groups like this one are a
breath of fresh air during those times.

Glad to be here :)

warmly,
jenn

___________________________________________________________
http://www.livingalaska.blogspot.com
